body: oh this is so amazing, just a great read overall. 100/10
This is a terrible pairing, but I have to say, this story really hooked me and pulled me in. Honestly better than RE-TAKE, and deserves its own OVA.  10/5
immediately added this to favorite after reading the amazing plot, best story and drawing so far, top notch artist
Wow the sauce! Best story I have read so far.
